questions: Is fire damage covered under the property insurance policy?

Are smoke and soot damages covered even if there was no major fire?
Are water damages from firefighting efforts covered too?
Are detached structures (like garages, sheds, guesthouses) covered for fire damage?
Are landscaping features (trees, plants, fences) covered?
